When we look at poetry we have to say,` This is where we're at'... Poetry sits atop this pyramid, and we have given birth to another aspect of it when we look at rap and spoken word. Poetry also has a distinct advantage in an age of tweets and sound-bites. "The brevity of a poem allows for the kind of fast-paced world we"re in," Major Jackson says. "
